title: Start1
body:
<<avatar sign>> 1[color=#e90b0b]Press Z[/color] to interact with the tree critters 🐜🐛🐞 [color=#07a9b0]Spacebar[/color] to jump.||
2And welcome to yarn's example GD project!>||
 [[Answer:Start2|Start2]]

title: ant
body:
<<avatar ant>>[b]Please don't bug me now[/b]... <<wait 1000>>  I am [i]quite[/i] busy at the moment.
Have you seen my crumb?
[[ yes |antcrumbyes ]] [[ no |antcrumbno ]]

title: antcrumbyes
body:
<<if $seenCrumb == true>>
Oh yeah? You saw it on a branch?
Did you taste it?...
<<else>>
Oh ha-ha! I can see that you are lying.
<<endif>>

title: antcrumbno
body:
Then [b]scram[/b]!
I don't have time for you...

title: crumb
body:
<<avatar crumb>> <<set $seenCrumb to true >> You stumbled on a giant crumb.
What would you like to do with it?
[[ taste it | eatCrumb]] [[ take it| takeCrumb]] [[ nothing |null ]]

title: eatCrumb
body: Let see <<wait 1000>>.<<wait 200>>.<<wait 200>> .<<wait 200>>these 🥨 are making you thirsty...

title: takeCrumb
body: The thing is way too heavy 😬 ....

title: start3
body:

5This is my tree||
6||<<avatar ant>>
7and my crumb||
